instructions: In the Home app, touch and hold the HomePod button. Swipe up on the screen or tap the Settings button , then configure the HomePod settings. You can assign HomePod to a different room, create a stereo pair with two HomePod speakers in the same room, rename HomePod, turn on accessibility features, and more.
On your Android phone or tablet, open the Google app . Tap More and then Reminders . Tap an upcoming reminder and then OK .
